channel.title: Near Future V2 - Innovating the future | Eco/Spawn | Master| Instant Pk! Beta
channel.description:
Alright Guys, This is my project/server dev thread.
I started Near Future v1 not to long ago, and i ended up letting a person develop with me.. i ended up getting love over he helped a little here and there.. and next thing you know.. someone on the server messages me on our forums saying... So and so is trying to sell your project.. So i decided to work on Near Future V2 a different base a new start ETC..
So now im looking for a team to help out and be apart of Near Future's Alpha Release
What i am looking for
[CODE] [COLOR="#DAA520"]Client Developer: Graphics Designer: Forum Mods and ingame mods: Others:[/COLOR] [/CODE]
Fill this out if you want to be apart of Near Future and add me on skype xsgmhx! i am not looking for a server developer!
[CODE] [COLOR="#DAA520"]Years Of RSPS Coding: Current Age: Client Development Experiences: Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers: How dependable are you: How many hours a day can you put into the server: What time Zone: What time of the day you can code and how many days:[/COLOR] [/CODE]
[B][SIZE=5]After you have filled out the application Please put this in your Signature. It will greater your chances of being apart of this project!
Remove The Spaces between the URL and IMG!
[ url=www.anearfuture.com/webclient.html][ IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/3329fkw.png[/ IMG][/ url]
[/SIZE][/B]
[/COLOR][/B] [/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=6][COLOR="#00FFFF"]This is the advertisement thread [/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"][CENTER]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2a4o0fq.png[/img]
:admin: Near Future V2 - Innovating the future | Eco/Spawn | Master| Instant Pk!| :admin:
I ended up closing Near Future v1 due to a asshole trying to sell my old source! So i started on V2. V2 is more advanced, has alot more features and its only in Pre- Beta! so come and check it out if you want!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/qnobyt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/icojam/onebit/16/arrow-right-icon.png[/img][url=http://www.anearfuture.com]Website[/url]|| [IMG]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/icojam/onebit/16/arrow-right-icon.png[/img][url=http://www.anearfuture.com/webclient.html]Webclient![/url]||
:admin: Staff List :admin: Owners: Steeze Head-Administrator: Administrators: Sperry | Josh Head-Moderator: Moderators: Sappy
:admin: Features :admin: [SPOILER="Features"] Great Community Amazing Staff Most items spawnable master and pure command at login All Working Godsword Effects Barrelchest Anchor with Correct Animations Working Report Abuse button (Sends message to online Staff) Fully Working Prayer with Draining (Also Bones on Altar Use) Sled and Basket Of Egg Correct Animations PK Point Shop More Coming Soon... [/SPOILER]
:admin: Donator Benefits :admin: [SPOILER="Donator Benefits"] Special Hangout Area Donator Point Shop ::bank Custom yell Tags and Colors Loyalty Titles Special Forum Rank More Coming Soon... [/SPOILER]
:admin: Pictures :admin: [SPOILER="Media"] [img]http://i.imgflip.com/a9wg.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29az7s7.png[/img]
As the Server Progresses I will be updating this thread.[/CENTER]

item.title: Near Future V2 - Innovating the future | Eco/Spawn | Master| Instant Pk! Beta
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“NotoriousDictionary, post:2, topic:477948”]Applying for a Staff Position and Video Editor (if needed)
Current Age: 17
Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers: Been playing around here and there. Moderated in a few, and in one case Co-owned, a moderately successful server. I’ve met my fair share of corrupt and abusive staff, as well as loyal and mature staff and I can tell the difference between right and wrong (it’s just common sense). My main reason for playing servers is to PvP and I have become quite capable as a result (I am definitely not the best).
How dependable are you: I am dependable enough to meet specific deadlines and manage my time accordingly. I am independent and I don’t rely on others if unnecessary.
How many hours a day can you put into the server: Weekdays: 2 - 5, Weekends: 2 - 10 (with the exception of work and other mandatory activities)
What time Zone: GMT +/- 5:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

Assuming that you need a video editor; I record with Camtasia and edit in Sony Vegas Pro 12. It can take me up to a week’s worth of time to edit a video depending on the length, quality, and amount of ideas going on in my head. I have experience and confidence in my editing skills. I can’t show you any proof because my Youtube channel, along with the videos on it, was taken down for copyright infringement.

Edit: The forum doesn’t allow the following BBC tags in your signature: flash, glow, hr, html, img, php, youtube.[/quote]
For some reason, I vouch for this guy.

Read full topic
item.source: Near Future V2 - Innovating the future | Eco/Spawn | Master| Instant Pk! Beta
